purpose: The email announces the call for papers for workshops at the ISSRE 2025 conference, which will take place from October 21-24, 2025, in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil. It highlights the importance of the ISSRE conference in the field of software reliability engineering and provides details about confirmed workshops that will be co-located with the event. The email also outlines important deadlines for paper submissions and notifications, encouraging both industry practitioners and academic researchers to participate and share their ideas.

evidence_sentences: ISSRE (International Symposium on Software Reliability Engineering) is the leading conference on software reliability
The workshops aim at discussing recent developments and open challenges in engineering high-assurance software and systems
The following workshops are confirmed and will be co-located with ISSRE 2025:
- Workshop paper notification to authors: August 11th, 2025
Submit your paper via the EasyChair website
